Feats-General -- Female Skilled Human Rogue: 3
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +0
Background: Teacher Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 2185/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Breath Control: Can hold breath for 175 rd without suffocating
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 2; Class: 2; General: 1; Skill: 3 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Rogue (Key Attribute); Rogue (Racket)
Feats: A Home In Every Port; Additional Lore (Desert Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf); Ancestral Paragon; Armor Proficiency; Breath Control; Canny Acumen (Fortitude); Canny Acumen (Perception); Canny Acumen (Reflex); Canny Acumen (Will); Caravan Leader; Charming Liar; Diehard; Expeditious Search; Fast Recovery; Feather Step; Fleet; Improvised Repair; Incredible Initiative; Incredible Investiture; Incredible Scout; Keen Follower; Nimble Dodge; Numb To Death; Pet; Pick Up The Pace; Prescient Consumable; Prescient Planner; Ride; Robust Health; Shield Block; Skill Training (Outer Rifts Lore); Supertaster; Thorough Search; Toughness; True Perception; Tumble Behind; Unconventional Weaponry (Greatpick); Unconventional Weaponry (Light Pick); Untrained Improvisation; Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe) Rogue Features: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Rogue); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Deny Advantage; Dexterity; General Feats; Perception Expert; Rogue Feats; Rogue Key Attribute; Rogue Skills; Rogue's Racket; Save Expert (Reflex; Will); Save Trained (Fortitude); Scoundrel; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Sneak Attack; Surprise Attack Teacher Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Experienced Professional; Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Performance, Society; Academia Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Skilled Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestral Paragon: Ancestry Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 1 from any)
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Rogue Feats: Class Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Rogue Key Attribute: 1 selection
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 3 from any)
Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf): May take Dwarf ancestry feats
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 15 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities
Prescient Consumable: Can retrieve an undeclared consumable from backpack once per shopping trip
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Perception: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Academia Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Goblin Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Plains Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Hunting Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +6 (strength; trained) Iomedae Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Society: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +7 (intelligence; trained) Magnimar Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +8 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +5 (charisma; trained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Desert Lore: +9 (intelligence; expert) Nature: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +5 (charisma; trained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Underworld Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Games Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Outer Rifts Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Genealogy Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +5 (charisma; trained)
Languages: Common; Kholo; Sakvroth; Thalassic
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Desert Lore): Skill Expert (Desert Lore)
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Training (Outer Rifts Lore): Skill Trained (Outer Rifts Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +1 on untrained skill checks
A Home In Every Port: Can use 8 hr interaction in a town or village to obtain free lodging for self and 6 allies for 1 dy
Caravan Leader: Group can Hustle for the best length of time among its members plus 20 min
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 2x normal Speed
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Improvised Repair: Can quickly repair a broken item into shoddy condition
Incredible Scout: Scouting gives allies +2 initiative
Keen Follower: Gains +3 to Follow An Expert, or +4 when following a master, and others in the group can use self skill for group rolls
Pick Up The Pace: Hustling group can continue as long as the best member
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Supertaster: Automatically attempts to identify ingredients, including poisons, in consumed items, and tasting gives +2 to a relevant Recall Knowledge check
Thorough Search: Taking twice the normal time to Search gives +2 Perception on the check and changes a success into a critical success
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 20 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 18 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Crossbow (+8 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Heavy Crossbow (+8 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Lesser Acid Flask (+8 1 E R20'; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +3 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry (Greatpick): Weapon Familiarity (Greatpick)
Unconventional Weaponry (Light Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Light Pick)
Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe): Attack Trained (Dwarven Waraxe)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 3
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against the triggering attack when unencumbered
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks, or vs. all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn/Can take a free Step after a successful Feint with an agile or finesse weapon
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against the next self attack until the end of the turn
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Expert (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Expert (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Expert (Will)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Numb To Death: Regains +3 Hit Points and does not increase wounded condition when recovering from dying once per day
Robust Health: Successful Treat Wounds or Battle Medicine on self restores +3 Hit Points, and Battle Medicine can be used again after 1 hr
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Magic Notes:
Incredible Investiture: Can invest 12 magic items
True Perception: Has constant 6th-rank Truesight effects, using Perception for the counteract check
Notes
Validation Errors:
A Home In Every Port Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and charisma modifier >= 3
Caravan Leader Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and pick up the pace feature (currently 1)
Expeditious Search Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 4 available vs. 37 allocated
Incredible Investiture Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and charisma modifier >= 3
Incredible Scout Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 3
Numb To Death Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and diehard feature (currently 1)
Prescient Consumable Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and prescient planner feature (currently 1)
Supertaster Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 3
True Perception Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 19 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 4
